venue.name: Jerry Remy's Sports Bar and Grill

item.description:
The Bay Area Boston Sports Fans Meetup Group are in town for the Yankees games.

About 12 members who do not have Friday night game tickets will be watching the Sox Yankees game at Remy's on Boylston Street in back of Fenway Park. (not the Remy's in the Seaport district) 

They have a table reservation for about 15 people for 7pm.

Our own Assistant Organizer Isabel Bourelle who formerly hails from the Bay Area will be there early for the first hour to do a meet and greet before she moves along to her next party.

Other available Natives are invited to come out and welcome our Bay Area Sox Fans. NO PINK HATS  Please!

Diane the Mary Poppins Event Organizer of the Bay Area Meetup will be hosting for her group.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Joyce Quindipan and the Bay Area Boston Sports Fans at Bar or Table Reservation or Leader Diane (Mary Poppins)
item.name: Join Visiting Bay Area Boston Sports Fans Meetup to Watch Yankees Game at Remy's
